title: Artificial intelligence set to transform mental health care for breast cancer patients
description: From virtual counselors that can hear depression creeping into a person's voice to smart watches that can detect stress, artificial intelligence is poised to revolutionize mental health care for patients with breast cancer.
content:

title: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek releases upgraded model with domestic chip support
description: BEIJING ― Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek released on Thursday an upgrade to its flagship V3 model that the company says has a feature that can optimize it for Chinese-made chips, along with faster processing speeds.

title: OpenAI Model Earns Gold-Medal Score at International Math Olympiad and Advances Path to Artificial General Intelligence
description: OpenAI researchers reveal how their experimental model, devoid of any external aids, powered through hours-long proofs to earn a gold-medal score at the International Math Olympiad, discuss the project’s origins and describe how such work could help lead to artificial general intelligence

title: ‘Great leaders see AI for what it is, a lever not a threat’
description: For many organisations artificial intelligence can be a frightening element of company-wide infrastructure, but it doesn't have to be.

title: Ambient documentation technologies reduce physician burnout and restore 'joy' in medicine, study shows
description: A study led by Mass General Brigham researchers reveals that ambient documentation technologies—generative artificial intelligence scribes that record patient visits and draft clinical notes for physician review before incorporating into electronic health records—led to significant reductions in physician burnout.

title: Study finds AI tools may weaken physician skills to detect cancer
description: Study finds that artificial intelligence exposure may reduce doctors' cancer detection rates during standard colonoscopies by 6%, raising concerns about AI dependency.
